data.name: Mahjong Business Style
data.detailed_description:
Become a business shark – play Mahjong on the exchange! Complete more than 100 levels, earning points and countless trophies. Climb the ladder of success and Wall Street will bow to you!

Each pack embodies a separate market – from stocks to advanced technologies.
The setup of each level contains a certain amount of gold pieces, which earn the player far more points than regular pieces. This adds variety to the game format and playing process.
The levels are balanced by difficulty: there are classic levels and setups with wandering pieces, in which the arrangement of the the tokens changes with each new attempt.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 x64
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 63 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 63 MB available space
